page.title: 11BACON FARM
page.content: THE MORRIS'S HAVE LIVED IN "BACON FARM" FOR 4\ YEARS. THEY OWN 6 ACRES BUT THE ORIGINAL FARM HAD ABOUT 240 ACRES WHICH IS NOW RENTED OUT BY TRUSTEES TO SWALCLIFFE GRANGE. THEY HAVE A SMALLHOLDING WITH SHEEP(10) PIGS(70), CHICKENS/BANTAMS(30) BUT IT IS NOT A BUSINESS CONCERN. THE FARM BUILDINGS ARE AROUND 400 YEARS OLD AND WORTH ABOUT Â£70-80,000. MR.MORRIS IS INVOLVED IN MAKING PLASTICS. THEY DO THEIR SHOPPING IN LOCAL SHOPS, AND A CAR IS ESSENTIAL FOR WHERE THEY LIVE. BEFORE THEY MOVED HERE THEY LIVED IN BURDROP AND MILCOMBE. THEY HAVE LIVED IN THIS AREA FOR 13 YEARS. THE HOUSE WAS IN VERY BAD CONDITION AND THEY HAVE IMPROVED IT AND BUILT AN EXTENSION. THE CEILINGS ARE VERY LOW AS THE HOUSE IS VERY OLD. THE LOFT IS NOW ONE BIG ROOM AND THERE ARE 4 BEDROOMS IN ALL.
